properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manava marali ra prabhu chentaku cherava?, Prabhu pilice tarunamulona raksincu ninu nedaina (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrdayamulo nemmadi leka vesari visigina bratuka, Kadasari niriksana idiye yesayya kaluvari siluve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chuttumuttayi vyadhulu varusa dikkutocani maranapu padaka, Kadasari niriksana idiye yesayya kaluvari siluve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papa bharamu toda nindi pagili potunna ni jiva patra, Kadasari niriksana idiye yesayya kaluvari siluve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Na kattiki eduruledani virravigi tirugucununte, Garvambu nanacunu yesu virigina hrdayamuto tirugu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kalvarilo ni korakesu rudhirambu chindincinadu, Jaliga pilice ninu prabhuvu viluvaina raksana nivva{/lang-eng}
